text:
I recently visited Rockafellers Puteri Harbour and had an amazing experience! The atmosphere was lively and vibrant, perfect for a night out with friends or just unwinding after a long week. The pub had a fantastic live band on Saturday night, adding to the upbeat and energetic vibe.

The food was absolutely delicious! We started with the grilled duck breast, which was cooked to perfection - juicy, tender, and full of flavor. The salad on the side was fresh and well-balanced. The Beef Wellington was another standout - beautifully flaky pastry on the outside and tender beef in the center, accompanied by a rich, flavorful gravy.

We also tried the pizza, which had a crispy base and generous toppings - definitely a great choice to pair with drinks. Speaking of drinks, the cocktails were well-made and refreshing, perfect for kicking back and enjoying the music.

Overall, Rockafellers Puteri Harbour is a fantastic spot for great food, drinks, and live music. If you’re looking for a place with a vibrant pub atmosphere and quality dishes, this is the place to be!
Pasta is fine but Marinara meat is dry. Quiet during daytime and nothing much around apart from yachts and condos nearby. Probably a place for night owls.

Very good ambience. 5 star service and very good food. I must say the waiter Vipin delivered top notch the service. He was soo good he was very attentive and friendly. I think he deserves a raise. As a student it is pricey but don’t judge it the whole experience was amazing. I am willing to come here again thanks to him and the amazingly good food.

The smoked duck salad, smoked duck and mushroom pasta was great! Pizza dough was a little disappointing though. Fries couldn’t go wrong but serving portion was a little small. The beef nachos was delicious with lots of different sides to go with.

Amazing experience at Rockafellers Puteri Habour! The ambiance was cozy and inviting, and every dish was full of flavor and beautifully presented. The staff was attentive and friendly, especially Hiteshri Vipin, making sure we had everything we needed for a great meal. Highly recommend for anyone looking for delicious food and a welcoming atmosphere!
